BreadcrumbDescription: I awoke in a putrid barn strapped to a filthy table. Oswen was preparing to slit my throat when the holy man from the shed broke into the barn and set me free. Now we fight our way out.
Callback115Header: Loot the Chapel Key from Vani's corpse
Name: A Hero's Reward
Phase26Description: I awoke in a putrid barn lying on a filthy cart. Oswen was preparing to slit my throat when the holy man from the shed broke into the barn and set me free. Now we fight our way out.
